message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I believe it's a unique opportunity for you to acquire a high-quality item that will meet your needs. I'm willing to offer it to you for $900000. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value to you.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $750000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $850000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our previous offers.

Thank you for your revised offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to compromise. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our previous offers. Would you consider $800000?

Thank you for your revised offer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to compromise. However, I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our previous offers again. Would you consider $825000?
Thank you for your revised offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to compromise. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway again. Would you consider $775000?
